description: Watch live coverage as Donald Trump is inaugurated president of the United States for the second time, becoming the nation’s 47th commander in chief. The ceremony will take place at the U.S. Capitol in front of past presidents, lawmakers, influential business leaders, and Americans gathered along the National Mall.
title: The inauguration of Donald Trump as the 47th U.S. president

description: WASHINGTON — Cleveland Mayor Justin Bibb will be the next head of the Democratic Mayors Association, succeeding Phoenix Mayor Kate Gallego.
title: Cleveland's Justin Bibb to lead Democratic mayors group

description: As fears grow of a possible bird flu pandemic in humans, the federal government is pouring more money into the development of new vaccines, including an mRNA shot.
title: As bird flu concerns grow, scientists race to develop new vaccines

description: The Supreme Court took up a dispute on the tensions between LGBT rights and religious rights by agreeing to hear a claim by parents in Maryland who objected to books in elementary school classrooms on gender transition and same-sex relationships.
title: Supreme Court takes up parents’ bid to opt out of LGBTQ content at elementary schools

description: Filmmaker Pedro Almodóvar's English-language feature debut, "The Room Next Door," stars Tilda Swinton and Julianne Moore as old friends who reunite as one of them prepares for death.
title: In 'The Room Next Door,' Pedro Almodóvar grapples with life, love and assisted suicide

description: LAS VEGAS — This year is expected to be a crucial one for Amazon’s autonomous vehicle unit Zoox, as the company plans to grow its operations and commercialize its robotaxi business.
title: Why 2025 is set to be a crucial year for Amazon's Zoox robotaxi unit

description: Senate Democrats are pushing for more transparency from presidential inaugural committees, as a wave of cash from corporations and their billionaire leaders floods Washington, D.C., before President-elect Donald Trump takes office.
title: Democrats push for inaugural oversight as Trump committee rakes in cash

description: Asset management giant Vanguard has been fined more than $100 million to settle charges related to disclosures around target date investment funds, the Securities and Exchange Commission announced Friday.
title: Vanguard fined more than $100 million by SEC over violations involving target date retirement funds

description: The Federal Trade Commission said Friday that it is suing PepsiCo for illegal price discrimination, alleging the food and beverage giant gave an unnamed retailer more favorable prices than its competition.
title: Pepsi sued by federal regulators for giving Walmart preferential soft-drink pricing

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin and his Iranian counterpart, Masoud Pezeshkian, signed a broad cooperation pact Friday as their countries deepened their partnership in the face of stinging Western sanctions.
title: Russia and Iran sign a partnership treaty to deepen their ties in the face of Western sanctions

description: The Trevor Project, a national LGBTQ youth suicide prevention and crisis intervention organization, announced Friday that it will undergo a “transformation” that will include layoffs and restructuring.
title: The Trevor Project to undergo layoffs and restructuring in major ‘transformation’

description: Marcus Freeman was a former Ohio State star. Now the Notre Dame coach has to beat them in the national title game
title: Marcus Freeman starred at Ohio State. Now Notre Dame’s coach is its biggest foe.

description: The Louisiana State Police for years have used excessive force during arrests and vehicle pursuits, a statewide pattern of misconduct that places the public at “serious risk of harm,” according to a scathing report released Thursday by the U.S.
title: Louisiana State Police used excessive force for years, scathing DOJ report finds

description: President Joe Biden's administration said it will be up to President-elect Donald Trump to implement the ban on TikTok.
title: Biden administration says it will leave TikTok ban enforcement for Trump

description: Watch live coverage as President Biden delivers remarks to the winter meeting of the U.S. Conference of Mayors.
title: Biden delivers remarks at U.S. Conference of Mayors

description: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine is expected to appoint his lieutenant governor, Jon Husted, to the Senate seat recently vacated by Vice President-elect JD Vance, two sources with knowledge of the decision told NBC News.
title: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine expected to appoint Lt. Gov. Jon Husted to Vance's Senate seat

description: As the number of extreme weather events exacerbated by climate change increases, there is a growing workforce of laborers, many of them without legal status.
title: From L.A. wildfires to hurricanes, immigrants help rebuild after disasters. Some may face deportation

description: Rep. Sarah McBride, D-Del., the first openly transgender member of Congress, said she remains focused on her job and refuses to give Republicans what they want, which she said is for her to take the “bait” over a policy that bars her from women’s restrooms in the House.
title: Rep. Sarah McBride on picking her battles and not taking the ‘bait’

description: President-elect Donald Trump said in a Truth Social post Friday that he spoke that morning with Chinese President Xi Jinping, just four days ahead of his inauguration.
title: Trump says he spoke to Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday

description: Much of the U.S. will see temperatures plummet 20 to 40 degrees below average when a major Arctic outbreak bringing frigid temperatures sweeps through the country.
title: Temperatures will plummet as Arctic outbreak brings frigid weather to much of U.S.

description: Erling Haaland has signed a new contract at Manchester City through 2034, committing his long-term future to the Premier League champions with one of the most lucrative deals in soccer amid uncertain times for the club on and off the field.
title: Erling Haaland signs lucrative new contract with Man City until 2034

description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams is expected to meet with Donald Trump on Friday in Palm Beach, Florida, amid speculation that the president-elect could pardon him on federal corruption charges.
title: New York City Mayor Eric Adams to meet with Trump in Palm Beach

description: Award-winning British actor Joan Plowright, who with her late husband Laurence Olivier did much to revitalize the U.K.’s theatrical scene in the decades after World War II, has died.
title: Joan Plowright, Tony-winning actor and widow of Laurence Olivier, dies at 95

description: Eight NFL teams are facing off in four playoff games this weekend with one goal in sight: Super Bowl 59. NBC’s Kaylee Hartung reports for TODAY.
title: Inside the 4 NFL playoff games this weekends

description: WORCESTER, Mass. — Five Massachusetts college students appeared in court Thursday, accused of plotting to lure a man to their campus through a dating app and then seizing him as part of a “Catch a Predator” trend on TikTok.
title: College students appear in court in case stemming from 'Catch a Predator' fad on TikTok

description: A small stream of evacuated residents is returning to their neighborhood for the first time since the devastating wildfires in Southern California. NBC’s Morgan Chesky reports for TODAY on the road ahead for cleanup and recovery.
title: Residents return to fire-ravaged neighborhoods: ‘I started to cry’

description: Extreme cold is set to grip much of the country starting this weekend with the return of the polar vortex. Some regions are expected to see temperatures in the negatives early next week. TODAY’s Al Roker tracks the frigid forecast.
title: Polar vortex to bring bone-chilling temps across US

description: The United States on Thursday imposed sanctions on Sudan’s leader, army chief Abdel Fattah al-Burhan, accusing him of choosing war over negotiations.
title: U.S. issues sanctions on Sudanese army chief Burhan

description: Three lawyers for the late opposition leader Alexei Navalny were found guilty by a Russian court on Friday of belonging to an extremist group and sentenced to years in a penal colony.
title: Three Navalny lawyers sentenced to years in Russian penal colony for ‘extremist activity’

description: President Joe Biden’s decadeslong political career is coming to an end.
title: Israeli security cabinet votes on ceasefire deal and Biden's presidential legacy: Morning Rundown

description: O’Shea Jackson Jr. returns as Donnie, the once-unassuming heist driver, who is now front and center with box office star Gerard Butler for the Den of Thieves sequel.
title: O’Shea Jackson Jr. leads the heists and the box office with ‘Den of Thieves 2: Pantera’

description: A Pakistani court sentenced former Prime Minister Imran Khan to 14 years in prison on Friday in a land corruption case, a setback to talks between his party and the government.
title: Pakistan’s Imran Khan is sentenced to 14 years in prison in corruption case

description: The president said that with Friday's action he has "now issued more individual pardons and commutations than any president in U.S. history."
title: Biden sets pardons and commutations record with new clemency for nonviolent drug offenders

description: The swing voters who helped President-elect Donald Trump return to the White House are feeling optimistic about the next four years, but they’ll be watching to see whether their desire for change becomes a reality.
title: The swing voters who helped Trump win crave change — even if lowering prices proves challenging

description: About 1,500 people were instructed to leave Moss Landing and the Elkhorn Slough area.
title: Hundreds ordered to evacuate as fire erupts at huge California battery storage plant

description: The incoming Trump administration should renew its commitment to providing Taiwan with the means to defend itself, former Vice President Mike Pence said.
title: Pence urges Trump to stay committed to Taiwan during surprise visit to Taipei

description: South Korea’s anti-corruption agency said Friday that it would ask a Seoul court to extend the detention of arrested President Yoon Suk Yeol.
title: South Korea investigators to file request to extend President Yoon’s detention

description: Rod Stewart, Billie Eilish, the Red Hot Chili Peppers and Lady Gaga are among a star-studded set of musicians performing at a benefit concert later this month for wildfire recovery and relief, organizers announced Thursday.
title: Billie Eilish, Lady Gaga, Rod Stewart among artists to play at FireAid benefit concert

description: The president also said in his interview with MSNBC that he "almost spent too much time on the policy and not enough time on the politics" of programs he signed into law.
title: Biden says 'red states really screwed up' in handling their economies during Covid years

description: In the latest legal filing in the "It Ends With Us" saga, director and star Justin Baldoni alleges that co-star Blake Lively leaned on the powerful people in her life to ensure her vision for the movie ended up in the final cut.
title: Justin Baldoni accuses Blake Lively of using Taylor Swift to pressure him about changing movie

description: A man who rammed a U-Haul truck into a gate near the White House with aspirations of overthrowing the government was sentenced to eight years in prison.
title: Man who rammed gate near White House in attempt to overthrow government is sentenced to 8 years

description: The Colorado apartment complex where armed alleged members of a Venezuelan gang were seen on video breaking into an occupied unit will be closed.
title: Colorado apartments at center of Venezuelan gang debate to be closed

description: President-elect Donald Trump’s inauguration next week will mean sweeping changes in the way the federal government handles issues from foreign policy to education — and Education Secretary Miguel Cardona is already rebutting what he’s expecting to see from his successor.
title: Biden's education secretary made big changes. Here's what Trump's admin could change next.
